View Javadoc
1   package com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper;
2   
3   import javax.ws.rs.core.Feature;
4   import javax.ws.rs.core.FeatureContext;
5   
6   import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.ServerExceptionMappers.BusinessFlowExceptionMapper;
7   import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.ServerExceptionMappers.ConstraintExceptionMapper;
8   import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.ServerExceptionMappers.RmsSystemExceptionMapper;
9   import com.mamezou.rms.platform.provider.mapper.PageNotFoundExceptionMapper;
10  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.provider.mapper.UnhandledExceptionMapper;
11  
12  public class ServerExceptionMapperFeature implements Feature {
13  
14      @Override
15      public boolean configure(FeatureContext context) {
16          context.register(BusinessFlowExceptionMapper.class);
17          context.register(RmsSystemExceptionMapper.class);
18          context.register(ConstraintExceptionMapper.class);
19          context.register(PageNotFoundExceptionMapper.class);
20          context.register(UnhandledExceptionMapper.class);
21          return true;
22      }
23  }
